mapper.insert: insert into shipping(shipTitle, shipName, shipPhone, shipAddress, shipDefault, userName) values(#{shipTitle}, #{shipName}, #{shipPhone}, #{shipAddress}, #{shipDefault}, #{userName})
mapper.update: update shipping set shipTitle=#{shipTitle}, shipName=#{shipName}, shipPhone=#{shipPhone}, shipAddress=#{shipAddress}, shipDefault=#{shipDefault} where shipNum=#{shipNum}
